div.p: MS papers 37, folder 99, Alexander Turnbull Library, Wellington.

To proof.
Poor Mueller I am truly sorry to hear Mr Chevalier report of him but not surprised — He tells me he has been made Companion of the Order of St Michael & St George, & thanks me for my aid — I was obliged to tell him that I had not even heard of the order being given [...] when out of the [...] Islands: & his was the first intimation ∴ I had however tried hard on [...] occasions to press his claims for Knighthood. The fact is that Govts pretty well know that scientific men are above these things, & only take them when "nobless oblige" or official ettiquette demand it — & very wisely rarely offer them to scientific men. There is a talk of placing a few at the disposal of the scientific bodies — I am sure they will refuse such an invidious office as dispensers of court favour.
